page.title: 06LEISURE TIME CARNOUSTIE p2
page.content: Typical pastimes for the adults are also varied. There are{Keep-Fit classes,{Tennis, Badminton}and a selection of{Further Education}classes at the local High School. Some parents are also involved as {Youth Club}leaders. For the men this area is specially attractive. The main sport of a very high percentage of the local residents is{golf}for which the town is known world-wide. Indeed there are{three {golf-courses}on the links, one of which is a Championship course where the{British Open}has been played. Being on the coast this area is also popular with those who enjoy {sea-angling.} For freshwater{fishing the nearby{glens}have many{rivers which are excellent for this. Typical evening pastimes are{pool, {snooker, darts}and{bowling.
